body.name: PECHINOU 8 INCH Queen Size Mattress, Queen Mattress with Gel Memory Foam and Spring, Breathable Hybrid Mattress in a Box for a Cool & Peaceful Sleep, Strong Edge & Medium Firm Support, CertiPUR-US
features: Indulge in Blissful Slumber:Revel in the luxury of PECHINOU queen mattress, meticulously crafted with a harmonious blend of multi-layered memory foam and springs. This dynamic combination not only alleviates body pressure but also fosters a profound and restful sleep experience.

Precision-Engineered Sleep Innovation:Experience the epitome of restful nights with our queen size hybrid mattress, meticulously designed with springs. This innovative configuration ensures targeted support for your body, including the neck, shoulders, waist, hips, and legs, promoting ideal sleep postures.

Luxurious Comfort, Breathable Design:Indulge in the lavish comfort of our memory foam mattress, expertly crafted with high-end fabrics for a soft, silky touch. Immerse yourself in the embrace of premium thermophilic materials, delivering both high-density support and superior breathability. Say goodbye to discomfort as the mattress efficiently wicks away sweat, ensuring a restful night by maintaining the perfect balance of warmth.

Premium Spring Excellence:Our queen size mattresses feature high-quality fabrics, providing a touch of luxury to your sleep sanctuary. Every inch of memory foam is CertiPUR-US certified, ensuring it is free from harmful substances. Plus, crafted without the use of fiberglass, this mattress emerges as a safer and healthier choice for your home. Elevate your sleep safe with the assurance of top-tier quality and well-being.

Effortless Retail Experience:Embark on a worry-free journey with PECHINOU mattresses, featuring a generous 100-night trial,10-year warranty and a trouble-free 30-day return policy. Exercise caution when unboxing the mattress, as it may expand rapidly. For optimal performance, we recommend allowing the mattress to settle for 72 hours after unpacking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hassle-Free purchase and Very Comfy!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the PECHINOU 8 INCH Queen Size Mattress from SUYA-FURN and I couldn't be more pleased with the entire transaction.The mattress arrived quickly, and the transaction was smooth with no issues. The mattress was packaged securely, and we were able to sleep on it the same night. This mattress is incredibly comfortable. I am pleasantly surprised by the affordability of this high-quality mattress. It's a fantastic investment for the comfort it provides without breaking the bank.I am beyond happy with my purchase. This mattress exceeded my expectations in every aspect. If you're looking for a comfortable, affordable mattress with quick delivery, this is the one for you. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mattress! Perfect for platform frames!
reviews.reviewText: This mattress is so comfortable & definitely a great value for the price! We ordered one for our platform frame and have used it the past two weeks - love it! Shipping was super fast and setup was extremely easy! Comes in a large box, easy to unpack, and sets up fairly quickly. Will be coming back to order a twin size when we go to replace our kid's mattresses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Brought this mattress for my kids bed. He loves it says it is very comfortable. The instructions were easy to read and simple came with a blade to open it so you don’t accidentally cut into the mattress . Definitely worth the money .

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mattress at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Mattress is comfy and not lumpy. Good quality for the price point. Would purchase again!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, Just Wow
reviews.reviewText: You are really getting some bang for your buck!! Not only are you getting a bargain, but you are getting comfort. I got my first good night’s sleep in a very long time. The stitching on the mattress is quality. There is enough give in the mattress for comfort but firm enough that it isn’t flimsy. I highly recommend!!
